content: LankaTel (Pvt) Ltd, trading as LankaTel, is Sri Lanka's pioneer Internet Service Provider and leading telecommunications company. LankaTel provides comprehensive telecommunications services including fixed-line broadband, mobile services, enterprise solutions, and digital services. The company serves millions of customers across all 25 districts of Sri Lanka.

LankaTel's Mission: To connect every Sri Lankan with world-class telecommunications services at affordable prices, driving digital transformation and economic growth across the nation. We are committed to innovation, customer satisfaction, and sustainable development while maintaining the highest standards of corporate governance and social responsibility.

LankaTel's Vision: To be the leading digital lifestyle enabler in South Asia, empowering individuals, businesses, and communities through innovative telecommunications solutions. We aim to achieve digital inclusion across Sri Lanka, making technology accessible to every citizen regardless of location or economic status.

LankaTel operates on five core values: 1) INNOVATION (නවෝත්පාදනය) - Continuously exploring new technologies to enhance customer experience. 2) INTEGRITY (අඛණ්ඩතාව) - Maintaining transparency and ethical conduct in all business dealings. 3) CUSTOMER FOCUS (පාරිභෝගික අවධානය) - Placing customers at the center of every decision. 4) TEAMWORK (කණ්ඩායම් වැඩ) - Collaborating across departments to achieve excellence. 5) SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY (සමාජ වගකීම) - Contributing positively to Sri Lankan society.

LankaTel is governed by an experienced Board of Directors comprising industry experts in telecommunications, finance, law, technology, and human resources. The company maintains transparent governance practices and adheres to all regulatory requirements set by the Telecommunications Regulatory Commission of Sri Lanka (TRCSL).

LankaTel is led by an experienced executive management team with expertise in telecommunications, technology, finance, operations, marketing, and human resources. The leadership team brings decades of combined experience from leading telecom companies in Sri Lanka and internationally.

LankaTel operates under licenses issued by the Telecommunications Regulatory Commission of Sri Lanka (TRCSL). The company holds valid licenses for ISP services, mobile telecommunications, and fiber infrastructure. LankaTel is fully compliant with all regulatory requirements and industry standards.

LankaTel CSR Initiatives include: 'Digital Gamata' - Free computer labs in rural schools, 'Women in Tech' - Scholarships for female IT students, 'Green Tower' - Solar-powered telecom towers, 'E-Saukya' - Telemedicine connectivity for rural hospitals, 'Disabled Connect' - Subsidized services for differently-abled citizens, 'Disaster Relief Network' - Emergency communication during natural disasters.

LankaTel Business Segments: 1) CONSUMER MOBILE - Prepaid, postpaid, and hybrid mobile services. 2) FIXED BROADBAND - FTTH, ADSL, and wireless broadband. 3) ENTERPRISE SOLUTIONS - Corporate connectivity, cloud services, data centers. 4) DIGITAL SERVICES - OTT platforms, fintech, IoT solutions. 5) WHOLESALE - Infrastructure sharing, international traffic.

LankaTel provides comprehensive network coverage across Sri Lanka: 5G Coverage available in major urban areas, 4G Coverage reaching over 95% of the population, Fixed Broadband (FTTH/ADSL) available in urban and suburban areas, Mobile network covering all 25 districts. Check coverage for your specific location using the MyLankaTel app or website.

LankaTel holds quality and compliance certifications including: ISO 9001:2015 (Quality Management), ISO 27001:2022 (Information Security), ISO 14001:2015 (Environmental Management), ISO 45001:2018 (Occupational Health & Safety), ISO 22301:2019 (Business Continuity), PCI DSS (Payment Card Security). All TRCSL licenses are current and compliant.
